description: The IN1 segment contains insurance policy coverage information necessary to produce properly pro-rated and patient and insurance bills.

fields.name: Set Id - Insurance
fields.description: sequence number which uniquely identifies this transaction for the purpose of adding, changing, or deleting the transaction

fields.name: Insurance Plan Id
fields.description: uniquely identifies the insurance plan.  Refer to user-defined table 0072 - insurance plan ID.  To eliminate a plan, the plan could be sent with null values in each subsequent element.  If the respective systems can support it, a null value can be sent in the plan field

fields.name: Insurance Company Id
fields.description: uniquely identifies the insurance company

fields.name: Insurance Company Name
fields.description: name of the insurance company

fields.name: Insurance Company Address
fields.description: address of the insurance company

fields.name: Insurance Company Contact Pers
fields.description: name of the person who should be contacted at the insurance company

fields.name: Insurance Company Phone Number
fields.description: phone number of the insurance company

fields.name: Group Number
fields.description: group number of the insured's insurance

fields.name: Group Name
fields.description: group name of the insured's insurance

fields.name: Insured's Group Employer Id
fields.description: group employer ID of the insured's insurance

fields.name: Insured's Group Employer Name
fields.description: name of the employer which provides the employee's insurance

fields.name: Plan Effective Date
fields.description: date that the insurance goes into effect

fields.name: Plan Expiration Date
fields.description: last date of service that the insurance will cover or be responsible for

fields.name: Authorization Information
fields.description: based on the type of insurance, some coverages require that an authorization number or code be obtained prior to all non emergency admissions and within  48 hours of an emergency  admission.  Insurance billing would not be permitted without this number.  Date and source of authorization are sub-fields

fields.name: Plan Type
fields.description: coding structure that identifies the various plan types.  Refer to user-defined table 0086 - plan ID

fields.name: Name Of Insured
fields.description: name of the insured person

fields.name: Insured's Relationship To Patient
fields.description: insured's relationship to the patient. Refer to user-defined table 0063 - relationship

fields.name: Insured's Date Of Birth
fields.description: date of birth of insured

fields.name: Insured's Address
fields.description: address of insured person

fields.name: Assignment Of Benefits
fields.description: has the insured agreed to assign the insurance benefits to the healthcare provider? If so, the insurance will pay the provider directly.  Refer to user-defined table 0135 - assignment of benefits for suggested values

fields.name: Coordination Of Benefits
fields.description: does this insurance work in conjunction with other insurance plans, or does it provide independent coverage and payment of benefits regardless of other insurance that might be available to the patient?  Refer to user-defined table 0173 - coordination of benefits for suggested values

fields.name: Coordination Of Benefits - Priority
fields.description: if the insurance works in conjunction with other insurance plans, what is priority sequence?  Values are: 1, 2, 3, etc

fields.name: Notice Of Admission Code
fields.description: does the insurance require a written notice of admission from the healthcare provider?  Refer to table 0136 - Y/N indicator for valid values

fields.name: Notice Of Admission Date
fields.description: if a notice is required, this is the date that it was sent

fields.name: Report Of Eligibility Code
fields.description: does this insurance carrier send a report which indicates that the patient is eligible for benefits and identifies those benefits?  Refer to table 0136 - Y/N indicator for valid values

fields.name: Report Of Eligibility Date
fields.description: if a report of eligibility (ROE) was received, this indicates the date it was received

fields.name: Release Information Code
fields.description: can the healthcare provider release information about the patient, and what information can be released.  Refer to user-defined table 0093 - release information code for suggested values

fields.name: Pre-admit Certification (pac)
fields.description: pre-admission certification code.  If the admission must be certified before the admission, this is the code associated with the admission.

fields.name: Verification Date / Time
fields.description: date/time that the healthcare provider verified that the patient has the indicated benefits

fields.name: Verification By
fields.description: person that verified the benefits

fields.name: Type Of Agreement Code
fields.description: used to further identify an insurance plan.  Refer to user-defined table 0098 - type of agreement code for suggested values.  Suggested values are standard, unified, or maternity

fields.name: Billing Status
fields.description: has the particular insurance been billed and if so, what type of bill.  Refer to user-defined table 0022 - billing status for suggested values

fields.name: Lifetime Reserve Days
fields.description: number of days left where a certain service may be provided or covered under an insurance policy

fields.name: Delay Before Lifetime Reserve Days
fields.description: delay before lifetime reserve days

fields.name: Company Plan Code
fields.description: Refer to user-defined table 0042 - company plan code.  This table contains codes used to uniquely identify an insurance plan.  Optional information to further define data in IN1-3-insurance company ID

fields.name: Policy Number
fields.description: individual policy number of the insured

fields.name: Policy Deductible
fields.description: amount specified by the insurance plan that is the responsibility of the guarantor

fields.name: Policy Limit - Amount
fields.description: maximum amount that the insurance policy will pay.  In some cases, the limit may be for a single encounter

fields.name: Policy Limit - Days
fields.description: maximum number of days that the insurance policy will cover

fields.name: Room Rate - Semi-private
fields.description: average room rate that the policy will cover.  It is recommended that IN2-28-room coverage type/amount be used instead of this field.  This field remains only for backward compatibility

fields.name: Room Rate - Private
fields.description: maximum private room rate the policy will cover.  It is recommended that IN2-28-room coverage type/amount be used instead of this field.  This field remains only for backward compatibility

fields.name: Insured's Employment Status
fields.description: refer to user-defined table 0066 - employment status for valid codes

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced by the <text>.  Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: Name or description of the item in question.  E.g., myocardial infarction or x-ray impression.  Its data type is string (ST).

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Each coding system will be assigned a unique identifier.  This component will serve to identify the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item.  For backward compatibility, if this component is absent, it will be taken to mean the CPT-4 with ASTM extensions, i.e., AS4.  Other coding systems that might appear here are ICD-9, ICD-10, SNOMED, etc.  Each system will be given a unique identifying string.  The current ASTM 1238-88  diagnostic/procedure/observation/drug ID/health outcomes coding systems are identified in the tables below.  Others may be added as needed.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: These three components are defined analogously to the above for the alternate or local coding system.  If the Alternate Text component is absent, and the Alternate Identifier is present, the Alternate Text will be taken to be the same as the Text component.  If the Alternate Coding System component is absent, it will be taken to mean the locally defined system

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: These three components are defined analogously to the above for the alternate or local coding system.  If the Alternate Text component is absent, and the Alternate Identifier is present, the Alternate Text will be taken to be the same as the Text component.  If the Alternate Coding System component is absent, it will be taken to mean the locally defined system

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: These three components are defined analogously to the above for the alternate or local coding system.  If the Alternate Text component is absent, and the Alternate Identifier is present, the Alternate Text will be taken to be the same as the Text component.  If the Alternate Coding System component is absent, it will be taken to mean the locally defined system

fields.name: Insured's Sex
fields.description: refer to table 0001 - sex for valid codes.

fields.name: Insured's Employer Address
fields.description: address of the insured employee

fields.name: Verification Status
fields.description: status of this patient's relationship with this insurance carrier

fields.name: Prior Insurance Plan Id
fields.description: uniquely identifies the prior insurance plan when the plan ID changes.  Refer to user-defined table 0072 - insurance plan ID
